original_title: Commemorating Easter Sunday terror attack victims
original_body_lines: People commemorated their kith and kin who lost their precious lives in terror attacks on an Easter Sunday four years ago, gathered at a cemetery in Katuwapitiya. Over 260 people were killed and many others were maimed in the dastardly attacks on civilians in three churches and three luxury hotels in the island on April 21, 2019. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
